snippet: Tom Coughlin turned an expansion team into a contender then found Super Bowl glory with the New York Giants after ditching his authoritarian approach for a more inclusive style....
lead_paragraph: Tom Coughlin turned an expansion team into a contender then found Super Bowl glory with the New York Giants after ditching his authoritarian approach for a more inclusive style.

headline.main: Coughlin's Willingness to Change Led to Super Bowls
headline.print_headline: Coughlin's Willingness to Change Led to Super Bowls
